languages.text: {n}Взгляды самых ретивых бойцов Комиссара недовольно вспыхивают, но большинство встречает ваши слова с усталым облегчением. В толпе слышатся шепотки:{/n} "А что? Может, и выживем тут. Злобины-то выродки как-то выживали. Не пропадем и без Императора".

{n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."
languages.original_text: {n}Взгляды самых ретивых бойцов Комиссара недовольно вспыхивают, но большинство встречает ваши слова с усталым облегчением. В толпе слышатся шепотки:{/n} "А что? Может, и выживем тут. Злобины-то выродки как-то выживали. Не пропадем и без Императора".

traits.locale_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority meet your words with tired relief. You hear whispers in the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}コミッサーの熱狂的な戦士たちは不愉快そうな表情を浮かべるが、大多数はあなたの言葉に疲れたような安堵の表情を浮かべる。あなたは群衆の中で囁く声を耳にする。{/n}「まあ、いいじゃないか。生き残れるかもしれないんだぞ。マリスのチンピラどもだって、自分たちでどうにかうまくやっていたんだ。皇帝がいなくたって大丈夫さ」
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーの熱狂的な戦士たちは不愉快そうな表情を浮かべるが、大多数はあなたの言葉に疲れたような安堵の表情を浮かべる。あなたは群衆の中で囁く声を耳にする。{/n}「まあ、いいじゃないか。生き残れるかもしれないんだぞ。マリスのチンピラどもだって、自分たちでどうにかうまくやっていたんだ。皇帝がいなくたって大丈夫さ」
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}你从政委最狂热的那些战士的脸上看到了不满的表情，但绝大多数战士听了你的话，都宽慰地松了口气。你听到人群中传来了窃窃私语。{/n}“是啊，这有何不可呢？说不定我们还能活下来呢。恶棍手下那群暴徒活得都挺好，就算没有帝皇，我们也能好好活下去。”
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}你从政委最狂热的那些战士的脸上看到了不满的表情，但绝大多数战士听了你的话，都疲惫地松了口气。你听到人群中传来了窃窃私语。{/n}“是啊，这有何不可呢？说不定我们还能活下来呢。恶棍手下那群暴徒活得都挺好，就算没有帝皇，我们也能好好活下去。”
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Percibes miradas de desagrado procedentes de los combatientes más fervientes del comisario, pero la mayoría recibe tus palabras con agotado alivio. Se oyen murmullos entre la multitud.{/n} «¿Por qué no? Quizás sobrevivamos. A los matones de Malicia no les iba mal. Y nos irá bien sin el Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Percibes miradas de desagrado procedentes de los combatientes más fervientes del comisario, pero la mayoría recibe tus palabras con alivio. Se oyen murmullos entre la multitud.{/n} «¿Por qué no? Quizás sobrevivamos. A los matones de Malicia no les iba mal. Y nos irá bien sin el Emperador».
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Die wildesten Kämpfer des Kommissars blicken dich missbilligend an, doch der Großteil begrüßt deine Worte mit erschöpfter Erleichterung. Du hörst ein Flüstern in der Menge:{/n} "Na ja, warum nicht? Vielleicht überleben wir ja. Tückes Schlägern ging es doch recht gut. Und wir kommen auch ohne den Imperator bestens zurecht."
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die wildesten Kämpfer des Kommissars blicken dich missbilligend an, doch der Großteil begrüßt deine Worte mit erschöpfter Erleichterung. Du hörst Getuschel in der Menge:{/n} "Na ja, warum nicht? Vielleicht überleben wir ja. Tückes Mistkerlen ging es doch recht gut. Und wir kommen auch ohne den Imperator bestens zurecht."
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Ceux des combattants qui étaient les plus fidèles au commissaire échangent des regards mécontents, mais la plupart des gladiateurs semblent plutôt éreintés et soulagés. Vous entendez les murmures qui agitent la foule :{/n} « Et pourquoi pas ? Peut-être que comme ça, on survivra. Les acolytes de Malice s'en sortaient plutôt pas mal, après tout. Et on n'a pas besoin de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ceux des combattants qui étaient les plus fidèles au commissaire échangent des regards mécontents, mais la plupart des gladiateurs semblent plutôt soulagés. Vous entendez les murmures qui agitent la foule :{/n} « Et pourquoi pas ? Peut-être que comme ça, on survivra. Les acolytes de Malice s'en sortaient plutôt pas mal, après tout. Et on n'a pas besoin de l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison

languages.text: {n}Komiser'in en hararetli savaşçılarından hoşnutsuz bakışlar alsan da çoğu, bu haberi alınca yorgun argın iç çekiyor. Kalabalığın fısıldaşmalarını duyuyorsun.{/n} "Olur ya, neden olmasın? Belki sağ çıkarız. Melanet'in adamlarının hâli vakti yerindeydi. İmparator olmayınca bizim de yerinde olabilir."
languages.original_text: {n}You catch looks of displeasure coming from the Commissar's most fervent fighters, but the majority greet your words with weary relief. You hear whispers among the crowd:{/n} "Well, why not? Maybe we will survive. Malice's thugs were doing all right for themselves. And we'll do just fine without the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser'in en hararetli savaşçılarından hoşnutsuz bakışlar alsan da, çoğu bu haberi alınca yorgun argın iç çekiyor. Kalabalıktan fısıltılar kulağına geliyor.{/n} "Tamam ya, neden olmasın? Belki sağ çıkarız. Melanet'in adamlarının hâli yerindeydi. İmparator'suz bizim hâlimiz de yerinde olabilir."
traits.speaker: ImperialZealot_Melee_Prison
